description: This file contains utility functions for pickling and unpickling objects to and from files, including handling directory creation and optional class verification.

methods.name: pickle_object_to_file
methods.description: Serializes an object and saves it to the specified file path, creating parent directories if necessary.

methods.name: unpickle_object_from_file
methods.description: Reads and deserializes an object from a file, optionally verifying its class type.
